title: Civil Department
content: Why did it suddenly become unpopular at PES ? Was it just because of the popularity of the CSE department that are clg didn't want to invest more in core engineering branches, as the placements would be low anyways, or was it something else? I heard that civil was very popular at PES at one point of time.

comments.body: civil was pretty popular everywhere back in the day, ig pes just cares about cse/placements and it didn't make any sense to continue to have the civil branch with such low demand
They're already planning to remove other branches too. Last I heard even Mechanical has undergone a large reduction in seats.

removed civil added AI/ML and will remove mechanical branch  2 years from now and then add IT branch or something related to CS..this college will soon become an IT college not only management here is a joke ...increase pessat fees every year..level of marketing and advertisement. And being in ece I struggled a lot... i regret joining this college..and going thru tough times..i dunno what to do in future.. despite getting placed..
